mil7.4.5:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pabbatassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.5:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sammānane vimānane sakkāre asakkāre garukāre agarukāre yase ayase nindāya pasaṃsāya sukhe dukkhe iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sabbattha rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu rajanīyesu na rajjitabbaṃ, dussanīyesu na dussitabbaṃ, muyhanīyesu na muyhitabbaṃ, na kampitabbaṃ na calitabbaṃ, pabbatena viya acalena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pabbato thaddho na kenaci saṃsaṭṭho;
mil7.4.5:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena thaddhena asaṃsaṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, na kenaci saṃsaggo karaṇīyo.
mil7.4.5:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pabbate bījaṃ na virūhati;
mil7.4.5:9.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sakamānase kilesā na virūhāpetabbā.
mil7.4.5:9.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:13.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇaccuggatena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:13.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:15.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pabbato anunnato anonato;
mil7.4.5:15.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena unnatāvanati na karaṇīyā.
mil7.4.5:15.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pabbatassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.5:15.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, upāsikāya cūḷasubhaddāya sakasamaṇe parikittayamānāya—
